value.name: Man accused of stealing guns from Palmerston North Police Station appears in court
value.description: Alan James Harris, 38, is accused of taking the firearms from the police station on Anzac Day, after a door was left open. If convicted of burglary, he could face a maximum of 10 years in prison.

value.name: Man who allegedly stole 11 firearms from Palmerston North Police Station arrested, guns still to be located
value.description: Palmerston North police have arrested the 38-year-old man who allegedly stole a number of firearms from the city’s police station on Anzac Day. Alan James Harris was arrested without incident in ...

value.name: Police fitness tests 'downgraded' for women
value.description: Fitness tests for the police are to be made easier because they are too hard for women. Half of female recruits fail the physical examination they undertake as part of their training. The move ...
